title: Advanced Nuances
description: Master subtle distinctions and sophisticated expressions for polished, native-like French. Challenging test for C1 learners.

title: Basic French Connectors
description: Test your knowledge of common French connectors and their usage in everyday situations.

title: Beginner Essentials
description: Test your knowledge of the most basic and essential French connectors. Perfect for A1 learners starting their French journey.

title: Contrasts & Oppositions
description: Master expressing contrasts, oppositions, and unexpected outcomes. Perfect for B1 learners developing nuanced communication skills.

title: Everyday Situations
description: Practice connectors in real-life contexts: making plans, shopping, explaining choices. Perfect for A2-B1 learners building practical communication skills.

title: Formal Expressions
description: Develop sophisticated expression skills with formal connectors used in professional and academic contexts. Designed for B2 learners.

title: Time & Sequence
description: Master the connectors that help you organize events in time and tell stories in the right order. For A2-B1 learners.
